title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When viewing the report design, it can be observed that the <property name="fileName" /> attribute stores an absolute path instead of a relative path. For example, it stores the absolute path as "E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary".
EB: The <property name="fileName" /> attribute should store a relative path instead of an absolute path, to improve portability and flexibility of the report design. For example, it should store the relative path as "lib1.rptlibrary".
SR:
To reproduce this issue:  
1. Open the report design that includes a library.  
2. Check the value of the <property name="fileName" /> attribute in the library inclusion section. It should display an absolute path.  
3. The expected behavior is that the <property name="fileName" /> attribute should display a relative path.  
4. Save the report design and verify that the <property name="fileName" /> attribute now stores a relative path.
